features: Made with durable, 14 oz certified organic cotton canvas
Heavy canvas carry strap & adjustable shoulder straps
slight padding in back is made with 100% recycled polyester felt (made with recycled water bottles)

Made in India in a facility certified under both the OCS (Organic Content Standard) & GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard) - accreditations requiring that rigorous social, environmental and technical standards be met.
